item.title: Apple Updates App Store Guidelines for NFT Sales: Details
item.description: Apple Updates App Store Guidelines for NFT Sales: Details In an update, Apple has restricted apps from using NFTs to encourage consumers to do business outside the company's purview, potentially circumventing the company's ability to charge up to 30.

item.title: Bitcoin (BTC) Outclasses Major Fiat Currencies And Equities In Q3
item.description: Bitcoin (BTC) Outclasses Major Fiat Currencies And Equities In Q3 Bitcoin, the de facto leader of all cryptocurrencies, will be entering the month of November this 2022 with trading price that is severely subpar with what it had the same month last year.
